reporter_caption.center: CITY OF ROCHESTER v. KAPELL, 177 N.Y. 533 (1903)

caption.center: THE CITY OF ROCHESTER, Respondent, v. GEORGE A. KAPELL, Appellant,

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.attorneys:
J.P. Varnum for appellant.
William A. Sutherland for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment affirmed, with costs, on opinion below.
Concur: GRAY, O'BRIEN, MARTIN and WERNER, JJ. Not voting: PARKER, Ch. J., BARTLETT and CULLEN, JJ.
